entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets this evening then to periods of light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
